name: That game where you shoot blocks
name_original: That game where you shoot blocks
description:
"That game where you hit a block" (or "That Game") is a fun Split-screen Multiplayer where you (as the name implies) hit blocks into the opponents side with a gun.

Controls:
Left joystick = Move, Right joystick = Look, Right Trigger = Shoot, X = reload, A = Jump

If you have any questions please leave a comment.
